text: David Leslie Johnson (born 22 May 1960) is a Canadian rower. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Toronto
title: David Johnson (rower)
